integration.title: Setup & Integration
integration.subtitle: Activate your AI Sales Assistant in 4 simple steps
integration.importantMessage: Ensure the chatbot widget is activated in your theme's app embeds section to keep it visible on your storefront.
integration.step1Description: Go to Online Store ‚Üí Themes in your Shopify admin, then click Customize on your active theme
integration.step2Description: In the theme editor, click the App embeds section in the left sidebar. Find AI Sales Assistant and toggle it ON
integration.step3Description: After enabling the app embed, you can click on AI Sales Assistant to access additional customization options directly in the theme editor, such as positioning and visibility preferences.
integration.step4Description: Click Save in the top right corner to publish your changes. Your chatbot will now be live on your store!
integration.customizationDescription: All chatbot customizations including design, positioning, colors, button text, and welcome messages are managed directly from this app settings page. Any changes you make here will automatically reflect on your storefront once the app embed is activated in your theme.
integration.customizationNote: No coding or theme editing required for customization!
integration.helpDescription: If you're having trouble activating the chatbot or need assistance with customization, please contact our support team. We're here to help you get the most out of your AI Sales Assistant.

analytics.insightLowEngagement: Low engagement (<2 messages per session). Consider improving welcome message and suggestions.
analytics.insightOtherIntent: Many queries classified as "OTHER". Review unhandled intents and add more training data.
